titleStmt.title: Atheisme close and open, anatomized And a refuge in affliction. Being prayers fitted for severall occasions. By I.W. Master of Arts.
titleStmt.author: Wingfield, John, Master of Arts.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, and are to be sold by Thomas Ellis at his house in the old Change,

notesStmt.note: Includes "An open atheist, publiquely arraigned, and convicted", which has a separately dated title page and separate pagination, and "Zoar: or a refuge in affliction, prayers", which has a divisional title page, and is unpaginated; register is continuous.
Identified as STC 25852a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his house in the old Change
